getPluginJarFile

public static File getPluginJarFile(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
Gets the Jar File where a given Plugin is loaded from. If the plugin is not in a Jar file, null is returned instead.

Author: bergerkiller

Parameters:
plugin - to get the Jar File of
Returns:
the Jar File in which the plugin resides, or null if none found

getPluginDataFolder

public static File getPluginDataFolder(org.bukkit.plugin.Plugin plugin)
Obtains the folder in which plugin-specific information is contained.
Usually this folder is /plugins/[pluginname].
This method can be used to properly obtain this folder if the plugin is not initialized yet.

Author: bergerkiller

Parameters:
plugin - to get the data folder of
Returns:
Plugin data folder (never null)

getPluginsFolder

public static File getPluginsFolder()
Returns the folder where all plugins are stored.

Returns:
The plugins folder.

deleteFolder

public static boolean deleteFolder(File file)
Delete a specified folder and all contents quietly.

Warning: This method will delete files, only folders!

Parameters:
file - The folder to delete.
Returns:
true if the delete was successful.
